info.name: penguins
info.description: From fractal programming in C (Stevens). Penguins is my name for this plot that was not shown in the book. Try also: 0.321+0i

iterator.function: (lambda (z c p) (+ (expt z 2) (real-part c) (* (imag-part c) p)))
